title: Scalable Model-Based Gaussian Process Clustering. (arXiv:2309.07882v1 [stat.CO])
abstract: Gaussian process is an indispensable tool in clustering functional data, owing to it's flexibility and inherent uncertainty quantification. However, when the functional data is observed over a large grid (say, of length $p$), Gaussian process clustering quickly renders itself infeasible, incurring $O(p^2)$ space complexity and $O(p^3)$ time complexity per iteration; and thus prohibiting it's natural adaptation to large environmental applications. To ensure scalability of Gaussian process clustering in such applications, we propose to embed the popular Vecchia approximation for Gaussian processes at the heart of the clustering task, provide crucial theoretical insights towards algorithmic design, and finally develop a computationally efficient expectation maximization (EM) algorithm. translated_title: 可扩展的基于模型的高斯过程聚类
translated_abstract: 高斯过程在聚类功能数据中是不可或缺的工具，因其灵活性和内在的不确定性量化。然而，当功能数据在一个大的网格上观测到时（比如长度为p），高斯过程聚类很快变得不可行，每次迭代的空间复杂度为O（p^2）和时间复杂度为O(p^3)；因此，阻碍了其在大型环境应用中的自然适应性。为了确保在这些应用中高斯过程聚类的可扩展性，我们提出将广泛采用的Vecchia逼近方法嵌入到聚类任务的核心，提供对算法设计的关键理论洞见，最终开发出计算效率高的期望最大化（EM）算法。通过模拟和极地温度异常分析，我们提供了我们的提案的实证证据。
tldr: 本论文提出了一种可扩展的基于模型的高斯过程聚类方法，通过在聚类任务中引入Vecchia逼近方法，提供了关键的理论支持，并开发了一个高效的EM算法，通过模拟和分析验证了其实用性。
